00060 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_DB extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00061 
00068         protected $table;
00069 
00076         protected $key;
00077 
00084         protected $doUpdate;
00085 
00091         public function process() {
00092 
00093                 $evaluation = TRUE;
00094                 if(isset($this->settings['condition'])) {
00095                         $condition = $this->parseCondition($this->settings['condition']);
00096                         eval('$evaluation = ' . $condition . ';');
00097                         $evaluationMessage = ($evaluation === TRUE) ?  'TRUE' : 'FALSE';
00098                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('condition',$evaluationMessage,$condition);
00099                                 
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 if($evaluation) {
00103                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('data_stored');
00104                                 
00105                         //initialize
00106                         $this->init();
00107                                 
00108                         //set fields to insert/update
00109                         $queryFields = $this->parseFields();
00110                                 
00111                         //query the database
00112                         $this->save($queryFields);
00113                 }
00114 
00115                 return $this->gp;
00116         }
00117 
00125         protected function parseCondition($condition) {
00126                 $pattern = '/[\w]+/is';
00127                 preg_match_all($pattern, $condition, $fields);
00128                 foreach($fields[0] as $fieldName) {
00129                         if (isset($this->gp[$fieldName])) {
00130                                         
00131                                 // Formats the value by surrounding it with '.
00132                                 $value = "'" . str_replace("'", "\'", $this->gp[$fieldName]) . "'";
00133 
00134                                 // Replace conditions
00135                                 $condition = str_replace($fieldName, $value, $condition);
00136                         }
00137                 }
00138                 return $condition;
00139         }
00140 
00147         protected function save(&$queryFields) {
00148 
00149                 //insert query
00150                 if(!$this->doUpdate) {
00151 
00152                         $query = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->INSERTquery($this->table,$queryFields);
00153                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('sql_request',$query);
00154                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_query($query);
00155                                 
00156                         //update query
00157                 } else {
00158                                 
00159                         //check if uid of record to update is in GP
00160                         $uid =$this->gp['uid'];
00161                         if(!$uid) {
00162                                 $uid = $this->gp[$this->key];
00163                         }
00164                         if($uid) {
00165 
00166                                 $query = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->UPDATEquery($this->table, $this->key . "=" . $uid, $queryFields);
00167                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('sql_request',$query);
00168                                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_query($query);
00169                         } else {
00170                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('no_update_possible');
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173         }
00174 
00180         protected function init() {
00181 
00182                 //make cObj instance
00183                 $this->cObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tslib_cObj');
00184                 $this->cObj->setCurrentVal($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00185 
00186                 //set table
00187                 $this->table = $this->settings['table'];
00188                 if(!$this->table || !is_array($this->settings['fields.'])) {
00189                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::throwException('no_table','F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_DB');
00190                         return;
00191                 }
00192 
00193                 //set primary key field
00194                 $this->key = $this->settings['key'];
00195                 if(!$this->key) {
00196                         $this->key = "uid";
00197                 }
00198 
00199                 //check whether to update or to insert a record
00200                 $this->doUpdate = false;
00201                 if($this->settings['updateInsteadOfInsert']) {
00202                         $this->doUpdate = true;
00203                 }
00204         }
00205 
00211         protected function parseFields() {
00212                 $queryFields = array();
00213                 session_start();                
00214 
00215                 //parse mapping
00216                 foreach($this->settings['fields.'] as $fieldname=>$options) {
00217                         $fieldname = str_replace(".","",$fieldname);
00218                                 
00219                         if(isset($options) && is_array($options) && !isset($options['special'])) {
00220 
00221                                 //if no mapping default to the name of the form field
00222                                 if(!$options['mapping']) {
00223                                         $options['mapping'] = $fieldname;
00224                                 }
00225 
00226                                 if($options['mapping.']) {
00227                                         $queryFields[$fieldname] = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($options['mapping'],$options['mapping.']);
00228                                 }
00229                                 else {
00230                                         $queryFields[$fieldname] = $this->gp[$options['mapping']];
00231                                 }
00232 
00233                                 //process empty value handling
00234                                 if($options['ifIsEmpty'] && strlen($this->gp[$options['mapping']]) == 0) {
00235                                                 
00236                                         //if given settings is a TypoScript object
00237                                         if(isset($options['if_is_empty.']) && is_array($options['if_is_empty.'])) {
00238                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($options['ifIsEmpty'],$options['ifIsEmpty.']);
00239                                         } else {
00240                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $options['ifIsEmpty'];
00241                                         }
00242                                 }
00243 
00244                                 //process array handling
00245                                 if(isset($this->gp[$options['mapping']]) && is_array($this->gp[$options['mapping']])) {
00246                                         $seperator = ",";
00247                                         if($options['seperator']) {
00248                                                 $seperator = $options['seperator'];
00249                                         }
00250                                         $queryFields[$fieldname] = implode($seperator,$this->gp[$options['mapping']]);
00251                                 }
00252 
00253                                 //process uploaded files
00254                                 if(isset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$fieldname]) && is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$fieldname])) {
00255                                         $queryFields[$fieldname] = $this->getFileList($fieldname);                              
00256                                 }
00257 
00258                                 //special mapping
00259                         } elseif(isset($options) && is_array($options) && isset($options['special'])) {
00260                                 switch($options['special']) {
00261                                         case "sub_datetime":
00262                                                 $now = date("Y-m-d H:i:s", time());
00263                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $now;
00264                                                 break;
00265                                         case "sub_tstamp":
00266                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = time();
00267                                                 break;
00268                                         case "ip":
00269                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR');
00270                                                 break;
00271                                 }
00272                         } else {
00273                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $options;
00274                         }
00275                 }
00276                 return $queryFields;
00277         }
00278 
00284         protected function getFileList($fieldname){
00285                 $filenames = array();
00286                 foreach ($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$fieldname] as $file) {
00287                         array_push($filenames, $file['uploaded_name']);
00288                 }
00289                 return implode(',',$filenames);
00290         }
00291 
00292 }
